kpi.name: M5000C428

kpi_info.title: TTI SCHEDULED DC HSDPA MIMO USER FOR PRIMARY CARRIER WITH ONE CARRIER SINGLE STREAM
kpi_info.use: Scheduled DC-HSDPA + MIMO users only from primary carrier when one carrier and MIMO Single Stream is used. When this counter is updated the counters M5000C331 and M5000C335 are updated also. UPDATED: The counter is updated by 1 if TTI was scheduled from primary carrier to DC+MIMO user when only one carrier and Single Stream was used.

kpi.kpi_alias: TTI SCHEDULED DC HSDPA MIMO USER FOR PRIMARY CARRIER WITH ONE CARRIER SINGLE STREAM
